---
title: BC Child Care Vacancies Dashboard + Mastodon Bot
date: 2024-06-09
---

A data scientist finds childcare.

This 2 part project extracts and deliveries child care vacancies using open-source BC childcare dataset. It uses github actions to automatically pull the updated data every day to 

1. post to mastodon new vacancies, and 
2. display vacancies in a webpage
